content:
NOTE: 中文（简体）网站请点击右上角球形图案
I am currently a perception algorithm engineer at Baidu Apollo researching on L4 perception and 3D point cloud detection.
I received my master degree from Shanghai Jiao Tong University (Inteliigent Vehicle Lab) in 2020, advised by Associate Professor Chunxiang Wang and Professor Ming Yang, and received my B.Eng from Shanghai Jiao Tong University in 2017.
My research interest focuses on 3D deep learning on point cloud and its applications on autonomous driving. In addition, I used to be the person in charge of the CyberTiggo self-driving system in the Intelligent Vehicle Lab, responsible for integrating and validating the self-driving system, and developing the decision-making, planning and control modules.
summary: NOTE: 中文（简体）网站请点击右上角球形图案 I am currently a perception algorithm engineer at Baidu Apollo researching

title: Restaurant Robot

content:
[2021.11] One paper accepted to IEEE Sensors Journal.
[2021.02] One paper accepted to CVPR 2021 Oral.
[2021.02] One paper accepted to IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters with joint ICRA 2021 option.
[2020.09] Our method RangeRCNN ranked 2nd on the KITTI 3D Car detection benchmark among all methods with papers.
[2020.07] Our method HRI-MSP-L ranked 1st on the KITTI cyclist detection benchmark for all four tasks (2D, 3D, BEV, Orientation).
[2020.06] One paper accepted to IEEE Robotics and Automation Letters with joint IROS 2020 option.
[2020.01] One paper accepted to Tsinghua Science and Technology.
[2019.02] Our method SALoss ranked first on the ScanNet benchmark (3D instance segmentation).
[2019.01] One paper accepted to ICRA 2019.
[2018.09] Our method HDGCN ranked first on the Paris-Lille-3D benchmark (3D semantic segmentation).
title: News

content: Responsible for the system integration including lane detection, LIDAR detection, traffic light detection, and vehicle localization modules and so on. Determine the function requirement and design the API of these modules with corresponding researchers together. Responsible for the decision, planning and control modules of the self-driving car. Responsible for the simulation test in ROS and the validation in the real car. Participate in the 2017 Intelligent Vehicle Future Challenge.
summary: 2016-11-30 ~ 2017-11-30   Responsible for developing L4 self-driving car
title: Develop L4 self-driving car
